parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return [[true]] if the machine (executing the command) is a dedicated multiplayer server. In single player returns [[false]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isDedicated'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {[[diag_log]] "Dedicated Server on the run !";};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isServer]], [[hasInterface]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 21, 2014 - 14:54 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
<code>[[if]] ([[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on dedicated server only
};

[[if]] ([[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	//run on dedicated server or player host
};

[[if]] ([[hasInterface]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. player host
};

[[if]] (![[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. player host and headless clients
};

[[if]] (![[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. headless clients but not player host
};

[[if]] (![[hasInterface]]) [[then]] {
	//run on headless clients and dedicated server
};

[[if]] (![[hasInterface]] && ![[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on headless clients only
};</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
